description: Include the state store section to save extraction states between runs. Use a state store if data is loaded incrementally. We support multiple state stores, but you can only configure one at a time.

raw.description: A RAW state store stores the extraction state in a table in CDF RAW.

database.description: Enter the database name in CDF RAW.

table.description: Enter the table name in CDF RAW.

upload-interval.description: Enter the interval in seconds between each upload to CDF RAW.

local.description: A local state store stores the extraction state in a JSON file on the local machine.

path.description: Insert the file path to a JSON file.

save-interval.description: Enter the interval in seconds between each save.
